divs: Sighting DetailsI was headed for Bible study on Firetower road on this night.This road has very little traffic,especially at night.After driving about 2 miles,I noticed a red-orange cylinder shaped object about 25 degrees above the horizon to the north.It was slowly moving in a Westerly direction.Trees passing by often obscured my vision of the object.When I got to a point where I could see the object clearly,I had an idea.I stopped the truck and flashed my headlights on and off.Suddenly the object winked out and quickly came on again.I flashed my lights again and once more I got the same result.The object seemed to be about 4 miles away.I had to stop observing the object because I was about to be late for Bible study.Two weeks later,which is tonight,I went to Bible study,but I didn't see anything unusual in the sky.We didn't have a meeting last Tuesday night.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Meridian
There were no other sightings in Meridian on or around January 19th 2010
Summary: A red-orange cylinder in the northern night sky
